variable.name: VERS
variable.description: Form Version

variable.name: FRQ1
variable.description: Since the last time we administered this questionnaire to you in (mm/yyyy), have you had any pain or discomfort in your chest?

variable.name: FRQ2
variable.description: Do you get chest pain/discomfort when you walk uphill or hurry?

variable.name: FRQ3
variable.description: Do you get chest pain/discomfort when you walk at ordinary pace on the level?

variable.name: FRQ4
variable.description: What do you do if you get chest pain/discomfort while you are walking?

variable.name: FRQ5
variable.description: If you stand still, what happens to chest pain/discomfort?

variable.name: FRQ6
variable.description: If you stand still, what happens to chest pain/discomfort - how soon?

variable.name: FRQ7A
variable.description: Will you show me where chest pain/discomfort was? Sternum (upper or middle)

variable.name: FRQ7B
variable.description: Will you show me where chest pain/discomfort was? Sternum (lower)

variable.name: FRQ7C
variable.description: Will you show me where chest pain/discomfort was? Left anterior chest

variable.name: FRQ7D
variable.description: Will you show me where chest pain/discomfort was? Left arm

variable.name: FRQ7E
variable.description: Will you show me where chest pain/discomfort was? Other

variable.name: FRQ7F
variable.description: Will you show me where chest pain/discomfort was? Specify (up to 16 characters)

variable.name: FRQ8
variable.description: How long ago did you start getting this pain?

variable.name: FRQ9
variable.description: Within the past 2 months, has your chest discomfort occurred more often?

variable.name: FRQ10
variable.description: Has it occurred at least twice as often as before?

variable.name: FRQ11
variable.description: Within the past two months, has the pain become more severe?

variable.name: FRQ12
variable.description: Within the past two months, has the pain lasted longer when it occurs?

variable.name: FRQ13
variable.description: Do you ever use nitroglycerin to relieve the pain?

variable.name: FRQ14
variable.description: Within the past two months, has the pain required more nitroglycerin to relieve it?

variable.name: FRQ15
variable.description: Within the past two months, have you started getting the pain with less exertion?

variable.name: FRQ16
variable.description: Within the past two months, have you started getting the pain while either standing still or at rest?

variable.name: FRQ17
variable.description: Within the past two months, have you started getting the pain while sleeping?

variable.name: FRQ19
variable.description: Code number of person conducting the interview.

variable.name: O_VISIT
variable.description: Indicates the visit number used for selecting study forms or central laboratory data.

variable.name: FSEQNO
variable.description: Form sequence number.

variable.name: LINENO
variable.description: Line number.

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Visit number based on follow-up time.

variable.name: FRQ18FUT
variable.description: Date questionnaire administered.

variable.name: GARNETID
variable.description: GARNET ID
